channel.title: RuneXero | 1.0
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aMIsO.png[/img]
[size=14pt][b][url=http://runexero.co.cc]Estimated release date.[/url][/b][/size][/center]
[u][b]1) Introduction[/b][/u] I honestly thought I was over with RSPS, I took a good couple of months off and now I'm back. Maybe because it's the money? Or maybe because it's the people I meet either way I'd like to re-develop RuneXero. I manged to recover an old source and client that I [u][b]did not[/b][/u] release and that I've worked on for many months. The base is of course PI, I find it easiest's to work with I don't actually understand why people hate it so much. If you mange to fix common errors it's actually alright.
[u][b]2) About the project[/b][/u] I don't want to re-create RuneScape, I want it to be similar. What I mean by that is; I want key features there! I don't care about the minor details nor do I care about adding quests or anything gay like that. I don't want it to be impossible to make money, I personally think that's stupid! You come to a private server to get away from that shit, of course I want a fairly stable economy but I'm sure we can work something out. I also don't want to re-create every skill for no reason, I still don't understand why people do that.
[b][u]3) Features[/u][/b] I've obviously added key features like I stated above, enjoy reading through them.
[u][b]Skills[/b][/u]
[b]Combat - 95%[/b] [list] [b]Melee[/b]
[ul][li]Correct following and distances[/li] [li]Correct weapon speeds[/li] [li]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, attack and defence)[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li] [li]Perfect hit delays[/li][/ul]
[b]Range[/b]
[ul][li]Correct projectiles and animations - 50%[/li] [li]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, accuracy and defence)[/li] [li]Correct bow and crossbow speeds[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li] [li]Correct distances and hit delays[/li] [li]Perfect following[/li][/ul]
[b]Magic[/b]
[ul][li]Correct graphics, distances, magic effects and spell speed[/li] [li]Perfected hit delays[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li] [li]Correct distance and magic following[/li] [li]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, accuracy and defence)[/li] [li]Perfected NPC sizes[/li][/ul]
[list] [b]Runecrafting - 50%[/b]
[ul][li]Use of the Abyss - 0%[/li] [li]All altars working[/li] [li]Correct multiple crafting[/li] [li]Use of Pouches included - 0%[/li][/ul]
[b]Agility - 10%[/b]
[ul][li]Gnome, Wilderness, Pyramid and Brimhaven courses usable - 25%[/li] [li]All obstacles around the map - 0%[/li] [li]Correct animations used[/li][/ul]
[b]Herblore - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Correct animations[/li] [li]All potions can be made[/li] [li]Correct first and secondary ingredients[/li] [li]Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)[/li][/ul]
[b]Thieving - 50%[/b]
[ul][li]NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula - 80%[/li] [li]Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards - 0%[/li] [li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li][/ul]
[b]Fletching - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]All logs can be fletched[/li] [li]Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log)[/li] [li]Can string bows[/li] [li]Can fletch crossbow bolts and tip them[/li][/ul]
[b]Slayer - 10%[/b]
[ul][li]Five global slayer masters - 0%[/li] [li]Rewards system[/li] [li]Very easy, easy, medium, hard and very hard slayer tasks[/li] [li]Can sell monster heads to slayer master for money - 0%[/li] [li]Slayer gem working - 0%[/li] [li]All equipment working - 0%[/li] [li]Correct requirements for slayer monsters[/li][/ul]
[b]Mining - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]All ores can be mined[/li] [li]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/li][/ul]
[b]Smithing - 95%[/b]
[ul][li]All bars can be made - 35%[/li] [li]All bars can be smithed[/li] [li]All equipment can be produced[/li] [li]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/li][/ul]
[b]Cooking - 20%[/b]
[ul][li]Fish cooking - 80%[/li] [li]Correct burning formula (can get cooking gauntlets from cooking guild) - 100%[/li] [li]Correct animation and timing used[/li] [li]Baking Cakes[/li] [li]Baking Pies[/li] [li]Making stews & Curries[/li] [li]Pizzas[/li][/ul]
[b]Fishing - 20%[/b]
[ul][li]All fish can be caught - 20%[/li] [li]Correct item requirements[/li] [li]Fishing spots located all around the world[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li][/ul]
[b]Firemaking - 25%[/b]
[ul][li]All logs lightable[/li] [li]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/li] [li]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li][/ul]
[b]Woodcutting - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Falling and regrowing trees[/li] [li]Correct hatchet finding[/li] [li]Correct hatchet animations[/li] [li]Birds Nests fall from tree[/li][/ul]
[b]Farming - 80%[/b]
[ul][li]Can use basic seeds on patch[/li] [li]Need to rake, dib and water[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Bosses[/b][/u]
[list] [b]Giant Mole - 0%[/b]
[ul][li]Correct animations used[/li] [li]Correct digging spots and graphics used (does this under half health)[/li] [li]Correct max hit, defence and attack formula[/li][/ul]
[b]Kalphite Queen - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Surrounded by Kalphites - Just need to spawn xD[/li] [li]Correct projectiles, maxhits and animations (multi hitting)[/li] [li]Two forms to defeat[/li][/ul]
[b]Dagannoth Kings - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Three different bosses[/li] [li]Correct accuracy, max hit and defence formulas[/li] [li]Correct projectiles and graphics used[/li] [li]Spinolyps surrounding the battle area[/li] [li]Spinolyps have their draining effect[/li][/ul]
[b]Chaos Elemental - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Three attacks (disarming, teleporting and destroying)[/li] [li]Correct projectiles and graphics used[/li] [li]Correct animations used[/li] [li]Multi attacking[/li] [li]Perfect accuracy, defence and max hit formula[/li][/ul]
[b]King Black Dragon - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Four breaths (Dragonfire, Icefire, Shockfire and Poisonfire)[/li] [li]Perfect defence, max hit and accuracy formula[/li] [li]Requires anti or dragonfire shield[/li] [li]Correct animations and projectiles used[/li] [li]Multi attacking[/li][/ul]
[b]General Graador - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range[/li] [li]Correct range attack (multi hits)[/li] [li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li] [li]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit)[/li][/ul]
[b]Kree'arra - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range[/li] [li]Correct range and magic attack (multi hits)[/li] [li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li] [li]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit)[/li][/ul]
[b]Commander Zilyana - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range[/li] [li]Has a special attack that charges up and attack opponent[/li] [li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li] [li]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit)[/li][/ul]
[b]K'ril Tsusaroth - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range[/li] [li]Correct magic attack (multi hits)[/li] [li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li] [li]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit)[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Mini-games[/b][/u]
[list] [b]Pest Control - 25%[/b]
[ul][li]NPC vs NPC[/li] [li]Correct interfaces[/li][/ul]
[b]Fight Pits - 80%[/b]
[ul][li]Correct timer[/li] [li]After entering, free-for-all[/li] [li]Last fighter in gets tokkul as reward - 0%[/li][/ul]
[b]Fight Caves - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Perfect monster effects[/li] [li]Correct animations, projectiles and graphics used[/li] [li]End reward is firecape and tokkul[/li][/ul]
[b]Warrior Guild - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Animators work perfectly[/li] [li]Must have 100 tokens before entering the Cyclopes room[/li] [li]Defender drop depending on what defender you have[/li] [li]10 tokens crumble every minute[/li][/ul]
[b]Barrows - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]All brothers working with effects and so on[/li] [li]Projectiles and graphics used are correct[/li] [li]Must have 6 kills before entering the tomb and looting the chest[/li] [li]Perfect rewards[/li][/ul]
[b]Clue scrolls - 0%[/b]
[ul][li]All three levels working[/li] [li]15-20 different clues to embark within those individual levels[/li] [li]Correct rewards[/li] [li]Correct monsters dropping[/li] [li]Saradomin and Zamorak mages (Level 3)[/li][/ul]
[b]Mage Arena - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Kolodian located in Mage Bank[/li] [li]All correct rounds[/li] [li]Correct graphics, animations, requirements and projectiles used[/li] [li]Can obtain both staff and cape from Statue room.[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Travelling[/b][/u] [list] [b]Amulet of Glory - 90%[/b]
[ul][li]Can teleport to four locations (Edgeville, Draynor Village, Karamja and Al-Kharid)[/li] [li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li] [li]Degrading - 0%[/li][/ul]
[b]Ring of Duelling - 0%[/b]
[ul][li]Can teleport to three locations (Duel Arena, Castle Wars and Fist of Guthix)[/li] [li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li][/ul]
[b]Games Necklace - 0%[/b]
[ul][li]Can teleport to 2 locations (Burthrope, Barbarian outpost.)[/li] [li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li][/ul]
[b]Gnome Glider - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]ALL Locations & interface added, Correct npc locations.[/li] [li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li][/ul]
[b]Skills Necklace - 0%[/b]
[ul][li]Can teleport to four locations (Fishing guild, Mining guild, Crafting guild, Cooking guild)[/li] [li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li][/ul]
[b]Teleport tablets - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]All tabs usable[/li] [li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li][/ul]
[b]Spell book teleports - 90%[/b]
[ul][li]New teleport system[/li] [li]All locations added - 80%[/li][/ul]
[b]Ports - 50%[/b]
[ul][li]Can travel to many locations[/li] [li]Dialogues and Taxes for travelling - 5%[/li][/ul]
[b]Wilderness Obelisks - 100%[/b]
[ul][li]Percfect travelling and timing[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Cities[/b][/u]
[b]In alphabetical order:[/b]
[ul][li]Ape Atoll - 0%[/li] [li]Ardougne (East & West) - 0%[/li] [li]Burthrope - 0%[/li] [li]Brimhaven - 0%[/li] [li]Camelot - 0%[/li] [li]Canifis - 0%[/li] [li]Catherby - 0%[/li] [li]Draynor - 0%[/li] [li]Edgeville - 0%[/li] [li]Entrana - 0%[/li] [li]Falador - 0%[/li] [li]Karamja (Non members) - 0%[/li] [li]Karamja (Members) - 0%[/li] [li]Lleyta - 0%[/li] [li]Lumbridge - 0%[/li] [li]Lunar Isle - 0%[/li] [li]Port Phasmatys - 0%[/li] [li]Port Sarim - 0%[/li] [li]Rellekka - 0%[/li] [li]Rimmington - 0%[/li] [li]Shilo Village - 0%[/li] [li]Tai Bwo Wannai - 0%[/li] [li]Taverly - 0%[/li] [li]Tree Gnome Stronghold - 0%[/li] [li]Trollheim - 0%[/li] [li]Tzhaar City - 0%[/li] [li]Varrock - 0%[/li] [li]Yanille - 0%[/li][/ul]
[center][u][b]Pictures[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Oc9a1.png[/img]
Antique lamps added - 24-1-2012. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2LHTs.png[/img]
Lottery system added - 24-1-2012. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jJyr6.png[/img]
Woodcutting improved now shows tree stumps - 25-1-2012. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cV4iF.png[/img][/center]

item.title: RuneXero | 1.0
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[center]

[size=14pt]Estimated release date.[/size][/center]

1) Introduction
I honestly thought I was over with RSPS, I took a good couple of months off and now I’m back. Maybe because it’s the money? Or maybe because it’s the people I meet either way I’d like to re-develop RuneXero. I manged to recover an old source and client that I did not release and that I’ve worked on for many months. The base is of course PI, I find it easiest’s to work with I don’t actually understand why people hate it so much. If you mange to fix common errors it’s actually alright.

2) About the project
I don’t want to re-create RuneScape, I want it to be similar. What I mean by that is; I want key features there! I don’t care about the minor details nor do I care about adding quests or anything gay like that. I don’t want it to be impossible to make money, I personally think that’s stupid! You come to a private server to get away from that shit, of course I want a fairly stable economy but I’m sure we can work something out. I also don’t want to re-create every skill for no reason, I still don’t understand why people do that.

3) Features
I’ve obviously added key features like I stated above, enjoy reading through them.

Skills

Combat - 95%
[list]
Melee

[ul][li]Correct following and distances[/li]
[li]Correct weapon speeds[/li]
[li]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, attack and defence)[/li]
[li]Correct animations[/li]
[li]Perfect hit delays[/li][/ul]

Range

[ul][li]Correct projectiles and animations - 50%[/li]
[li]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, accuracy and defence)[/li]
[li]Correct bow and crossbow speeds[/li]
[li]Correct animations[/li]
[li]Correct distances and hit delays[/li]
[li]Perfect following[/li][/ul]

Magic

[ul][li]Correct graphics, distances, magic effects and spell speed[/li]
[li]Perfected hit delays[/li]
[li]Correct animations[/li]
[li]Correct distance and magic following[/li]
[li]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, accuracy and defence)[/li]
[li]Perfected NPC sizes[/li][/ul]

[list]
Runecrafting - 50%

[ul][li]Use of the Abyss - 0%[/li]
[li]All altars working[/li]
[li]Correct multiple crafting[/li]
[li]Use of Pouches included - 0%[/li][/ul]

Agility - 10%

[ul][li]Gnome, Wilderness, Pyramid and Brimhaven courses usable - 25%[/li]
[li]All obstacles around the map - 0%[/li]
[li]Correct animations used[/li][/ul]

Herblore - 100%

[ul][li]Correct animations[/li]
[li]All potions can be made[/li]
[li]Correct first and secondary ingredients[/li]
[li]Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)[/li][/ul]

Thieving - 50%

[ul][li]NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula - 80%[/li]
[li]Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards - 0%[/li]
[li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li][/ul]

Fletching - 100%

[ul][li]All logs can be fletched[/li]
[li]Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log)[/li]
[li]Can string bows[/li]
[li]Can fletch crossbow bolts and tip them[/li][/ul]

Slayer - 10%

[ul][li]Five global slayer masters - 0%[/li]
[li]Rewards system[/li]
[li]Very easy, easy, medium, hard and very hard slayer tasks[/li]
[li]Can sell monster heads to slayer master for money - 0%[/li]
[li]Slayer gem working - 0%[/li]
[li]All equipment working - 0%[/li]
[li]Correct requirements for slayer monsters[/li][/ul]

Mining - 100%

[ul][li]All ores can be mined[/li]
[li]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/li][/ul]

Smithing - 95%

[ul][li]All bars can be made - 35%[/li]
[li]All bars can be smithed[/li]
[li]All equipment can be produced[/li]
[li]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/li][/ul]

Cooking - 20%

[ul][li]Fish cooking - 80%[/li]
[li]Correct burning formula (can get cooking gauntlets from cooking guild) - 100%[/li]
[li]Correct animation and timing used[/li]
[li]Baking Cakes[/li]
[li]Baking Pies[/li]
[li]Making stews & Curries[/li]
[li]Pizzas[/li][/ul]

Fishing - 20%

[ul][li]All fish can be caught - 20%[/li]
[li]Correct item requirements[/li]
[li]Fishing spots located all around the world[/li]
[li]Correct animations[/li][/ul]

Firemaking - 25%

[ul][li]All logs lightable[/li]
[li]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/li]
[li]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/li]
[li]Correct animations[/li][/ul]

Woodcutting - 100%

[ul][li]Falling and regrowing trees[/li]
[li]Correct hatchet finding[/li]
[li]Correct hatchet animations[/li]
[li]Birds Nests fall from tree[/li][/ul]

Farming - 80%

[ul][li]Can use basic seeds on patch[/li]
[li]Need to rake, dib and water[/li][/ul]

Bosses

[list]
Giant Mole - 0%

[ul][li]Correct animations used[/li]
[li]Correct digging spots and graphics used (does this under half health)[/li]
[li]Correct max hit, defence and attack formula[/li][/ul]

Kalphite Queen - 100%

[ul][li]Surrounded by Kalphites - Just need to spawn xD[/li]
[li]Correct projectiles, maxhits and animations (multi hitting)[/li]
[li]Two forms to defeat[/li][/ul]

Dagannoth Kings - 100%

[ul][li]Three different bosses[/li]
[li]Correct accuracy, max hit and defence formulas[/li]
[li]Correct projectiles and graphics used[/li]
[li]Spinolyps surrounding the battle area[/li]
[li]Spinolyps have their draining effect[/li][/ul]

Chaos Elemental - 100%

[ul][li]Three attacks (disarming, teleporting and destroying)[/li]
[li]Correct projectiles and graphics used[/li]
[li]Correct animations used[/li]
[li]Multi attacking[/li]
[li]Perfect accuracy, defence and max hit formula[/li][/ul]

King Black Dragon - 100%

[ul][li]Four breaths (Dragonfire, Icefire, Shockfire and Poisonfire)[/li]
[li]Perfect defence, max hit and accuracy formula[/li]
[li]Requires anti or dragonfire shield[/li]
[li]Correct animations and projectiles used[/li]
[li]Multi attacking[/li][/ul]

General Graador - 100%

[ul][li]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range[/li]
[li]Correct range attack (multi hits)[/li]
[li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li]
[li]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit)[/li][/ul]

Kree’arra - 100%

[ul][li]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range[/li]
[li]Correct range and magic attack (multi hits)[/li]
[li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li]
[li]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit)[/li][/ul]

Commander Zilyana - 100%

[ul][li]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range[/li]
[li]Has a special attack that charges up and attack opponent[/li]
[li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li]
[li]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit)[/li][/ul]

K’ril Tsusaroth - 100%

[ul][li]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range[/li]
[li]Correct magic attack (multi hits)[/li]
[li]Correct animations and graphics used[/li]
[li]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit)[/li][/ul]

Mini-games

[list]
Pest Control - 25%

[ul][li]NPC vs NPC[/li]
[li]Correct interfaces[/li][/ul]

Fight Pits - 80%

[ul][li]Correct timer[/li]
[li]After entering, free-for-all[/li]
[li]Last fighter in gets tokkul as reward - 0%[/li][/ul]

Fight Caves - 100%

[ul][li]Perfect monster effects[/li]
[li]Correct animations, projectiles and graphics used[/li]
[li]End reward is firecape and tokkul[/li][/ul]

Warrior Guild - 100%

[ul][li]Animators work perfectly[/li]
[li]Must have 100 tokens before entering the Cyclopes room[/li]
[li]Defender drop depending on what defender you have[/li]
[li]10 tokens crumble every minute[/li][/ul]

Barrows - 100%

[ul][li]All brothers working with effects and so on[/li]
[li]Projectiles and graphics used are correct[/li]
[li]Must have 6 kills before entering the tomb and looting the chest[/li]
